page.title: 08Employment
page.content: We did a survey on the jobs which our parents did and found out the following facts:- The full time jobs were mainly taken by dads with only 4% unemployed. Of the mothers only 32% were in full time employment. 52% of mothers had part time jobs however. The type of jobs showed many varieties such as a church minister, a baker, engineers, lecturers, electricians etc. Only 9% worked away from home and these included a long distance lorry driver, a sea going engineer and an engineer working in Holland. In the past many people lived in this area to work at ICI in Billingham. In fact on the Crooksbarn Estate there is a row of houses in which ICI managers used to live, but on our survey only 8% worked for ICI.
